overview: wacked..! tells the story of Michael and his friends Mani and Dani. All three of them are patients in a psychiatric institution with the same goal: they want out! The lively interplay between the characters sets the scene and provides insight into the manic-depressive protagonist's inner world. A serious topic, portrayed in an entertaining and direct manner.
tagline: wack|ed <adj.> (slang): high-strung, exalted, „wacko“; no longer of sound mind.
title: Wacked..!
